meanings.def: to come or go down from a higher to a lower level
examples: The results, ranked in descending order (= from the highest to the lowest) are as follows…
descend something She descended the stairs slowly.
At this point the path descends steeply.

meanings.def: to arrive and begin to affect somebody/something
examples: Night descends quickly in the tropics.
descend on/upon somebody/something Calm descended on the crowd.
